Sentencas: Solid oxide electrochemical cells (SOCs) hold potential as a critical component in the future landscape of renewable energy storage and conversion systems.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: However, the commercialization of SOCs still requires further breakthroughs in new material development and engineering designs to achieve high perfor-mance and durability.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: In this study, a data-driven powder-to-power framework has been presented, fully digitizing the morphology evolution of heterogeneous electrodes from fabrication to long-term opera-tion.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: This framework enables accurate performance prediction over the full life cycle.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: The intrinsic corre-lation between microstructural parameters and electrode durability is elucidated through parameter analysis.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: Rational control of the ion-conducting phase volume fraction can effectively suppress Ni coars-ening and mitigate the excessive ohmic loss caused by Ni migration.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: The initial and degraded electrode performances are attributed to the interplay of multiple parameters.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: A practical optimization strategy to enhance the initial performance and durability of the electrode is proposed through the construction of the surrogate model and the application of the optimization algorithm.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: The optimal electrode parameters are determined to accommodate various maximum operation time requirements.
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: By implementing the data-driven powder-to-power framework, it is possible to reduce the degradation rate of Ni-based elec-trodes from 2.132% to 0.703% kh-1
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework

Sentencas: with a required maximum operation time of over 50,000 h.(c) 2023
Titulo: Boosting the performance and durability of heterogeneous electrodes for solid oxide electrochemical cells utilizing a data-driven powder-to-power framework
